entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 03:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: S 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
